props.name: showBorders
props.description: Whether to show borders under each row.

props.name: cardClass
props.description:
Classes to add to the summary card. Setting this prop will force the list to display as a summary card.
You can bind a string, an array or an object, as with normal [Vue class bindings](https://vuejs.org/guide/essentials/class-and-style.html#binding-html-classes).

props.name: cardTitle
props.description: Text to use within the card title. If content is provided in the `card-title` slot, this prop will be ignored.

props.name: cardTitleHeadingLevel
props.description: Heading level of the card title, from `1` to `6`.

props.name: cardTitleClass
props.description:
Classes to add to the title wrapper.
You can bind a string, an array or an object, as with normal [Vue class bindings](https://vuejs.org/guide/essentials/class-and-style.html#binding-html-classes).

props.name: cardActionsClass
props.description:
Classes to add to the actions wrapper.
You can bind a string, an array or an object, as with normal [Vue class bindings](https://vuejs.org/guide/essentials/class-and-style.html#binding-html-classes).

slots.name: card-title
slots.description: The content of the card title. If content is provided in this slot, the `cardTitle` prop will be ignored.
